title: Cuba Gooding Jr smiles in handcuffs at sexual assault court hearing
text:
Cuba was in good spirits (Picture: AFP via Getty Images, Reuters)

Cuba Gooding Jr looked remarkably cheerful as he was placed in handcuffs at a court hearing for the latest sexual assault allegation against him today.

The Jerry Maguire actor was pictured arriving at the New York State Supreme Court in Manhattan on Tuesday morning, after handing himself in to police.

Dressed in a dark blue suit and tie, Cuba arrived at the courthouse flanked by his legal team and smiled happily at the crowd that had gathered. At one point, he even waved at onlookers.

Once inside the court, the 51-year-old had been placed in handcuffs and still smiled broadly while waiting for the arraignment to start.

According to the Mail Online, the Oscar-winning actor was being arraigned on new sexual abuse and groping charges that date back to 2001.

Details of the charges had remained sealed but were made public at the court hearing.

Cuba has pleaded not guilty to all charges against him.

The actor couldn’t stop smiling as he walked into the courtroom (Picture: Reuters)

Prosecutors read out 12 new sexual assault allegations against Cuba (Picture: Reuters)

It’s alleged that Cuba grabbed a woman’s bum at Tao nightclub in Manhattan’s Meatpacking District in October 2018. The actor has received two counts of third degree sexual abuse and forcible touching relating to that incident.

Cuba is now charged with four crimes that carry a maximum combined sentence of 36 months in prison.

Cuba has pleaded not guilty to all charges (Picture: New York Daily News Pool via AP)

During the court hearing, prosecutors are said to have revealed a total of 12 new allegations against Cuba that have not yet brought charges. However, they said they will use the claims to show his pattern of ‘degrading and abusing women’.

Some of those allegations include Cuba putting his hand up a woman’s skirt in 2014, biting a woman’s bare shoulder, sticking his tongue in others’ mouths without consent and putting his hand inside a woman’s blouse to squeeze her breast.

In another incident, Cuba is alleged to have told one woman to ‘sit on his face and pee in his mouth’.

The actor is already facing misdemeanour charges of forcibly touching and sex abuse in the third degree.
